name: Cosmic Asteroids
overview: A clone of Asteroids developed by Steve Evans and published by Alligata Software in 1983. You are stuck in an asteroid field, and you have to shoot them all. However, shooting them will result that they split into smaller asteroids. There are also aliens who will shoot at you! Luckily, you can use an endless amount of hyperspace warps which randomly spawns you at another location.
